permafrost.tundra.tn.profile

Class DestinationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.tn.profile.DestinationHelper

  • public final class DestinationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of convenience methods for working with TN Profile Destination objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getName(com.wm.app.tn.profile.Destination destination)
      Returns the destination name; supports custom destinations as well as built-in destinations.
      static com.wm.data.IData toIData(com.wm.app.tn.profile.Destination destination)
      Converts the given destination to an IData representation.
      static com.wm.data.IData toIData(java.lang.Iterable<com.wm.app.tn.profile.Destination> destinations)
      Returns an IData document containing a child IData document for each given destination.
      static com.wm.data.IData toIData(java.lang.Iterable<com.wm.app.tn.profile.Destination> destinations, com.wm.app.tn.profile.Destination preferredDestination)
      Returns an IData document containing a child IData document for each given destination.
      static com.wm.data.IData[] toIDataArray(java.lang.Iterable<com.wm.app.tn.profile.Destination> destinations)
      Returns an IData[] document list representation of the given list of destinations.

        Returns an IData[] document list representation of the given list of destinations.
        Parameters:
        destinations - The destinations to be converted to an IData[] document list representation.

      • toIData

        public static com.wm.data.IData toIData(java.lang.Iterable<com.wm.app.tn.profile.Destination> destinations,
                                        com.wm.app.tn.profile.Destination preferredDestination)
        Returns an IData document containing a child IData document for each given destination.
        Parameters:
        destinations - The destinations to convert to an IData representation.
        preferredDestination - The preferred destination if specified will be associated with the Preferred Protocol key in the resulting IData representation.
        Returns:
        The IData representation of the given destinations.

      • getName

        public static java.lang.String getName(com.wm.app.tn.profile.Destination destination)
        Returns the destination name; supports custom destinations as well as built-in destinations.
        Parameters:
        destination - The destination whose name is to be returned.
        Returns:
        The name of the given destination.
